name.th: เกม Cookie Clicker: Cookie Conquest
name.uk: Clicker de galletas: Conquista de galletas

short.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Play Cookie Clicker in your browser—click, upgrade, and dominate the world of cookies!
short.ca,uk: Juega a Cookie Clicker en tu navegador, ¡haz clic, mejora y domina el mundo de las galletas!
short.es,he,id,ms,no: ¡Juega a Cookie Clicker en tu navegador, haz clic, mejora y domina el mundo de las galletas!
short.et,hi: Jouez à Cookie Clicker dans votre navigateur - cliquez, améliorez et dominez le monde des cookies!
short.fi: Pelaa Cookie Clickeria selaimessasi—klikkaa, päivitä ja valloita keksien maailma!
short.fil: Maglaro ng Cookie Clicker sa iyong browser—mag-click, mag-upgrade, at sakupin ang mundo ng mga cookies!
short.fr: Jouez à Cookie Clicker dans votre navigateur : cliquez, améliorez-vous et dominez le monde des cookies !
short.hu: Játszd a Cookie Clicker-t a böngésződben - kattints, fejleszd, és uralkodj a sütemények világában!
short.it: Gioca a Cookie Clicker nel tuo browser - clicca, fai upgrade e domina il mondo dei biscotti!
short.ko: 브라우저에서 쿠키 클리커를 플레이하세요 - 클릭하고 업그레이드하여 쿠키의 세계를 정복하세요!
short.lt: Juega a Cookie Clicker en tu navegador, haz clic, mejora y domina el mundo de las galletas.
short.nl: Speel Cookie Clicker in je browser - klik, upgrade en domineer de wereld van koekjes!
short.pl: Graj w Cookie Clicker w swojej przeglądarce — klikaj, ulepszaj i zdobądź władzę nad światem ciasteczek!
short.ro: Jucați Cookie Clicker în browser-ul dvs. - faceți clic, faceți upgrade și dominați lumea cookie-urilor!
short.ru: Играйте в Cookie Clicker в своем браузере — кликайте, улучшайте и завоевывайте мир печенья!
short.sk: Hrajte Cookie Clicker vo svojom prehliadači - klikajte, vylepšujte a ovládnite svet sušienok!
short.sl: Predvajajte Cookie Clicker v svojem brskalniku - kliknite, nadgradite in prevladajte nad svetom piškotov!
short.sv: Spela Cookie Clicker i din webbläsare – klicka, uppgradera och dominera världen av kakor!
short.th: เล่น Cookie Clicker ในเว็บเบราว์เซอร์ของคุณ - คลิก อัพเกรด และเอาชนะโลกของคุกกี้!
short.tr: Tarayıcınızda Cookie Clicker oynayın - tıklayın, yükseltme yapın ve kurabiye dünyasını ele geçirin!
short.vi: Chơi Cookie Clicker trong trình duyệt của bạn - click, nâng cấp, và thống trị thế giới của các chiếc bánh cookie!
short.zh_CN: 在浏览器中玩Cookie Clicker——点击、升级，并统治饼干世界！
short.zh_TW: 在瀏覽器中玩Cookie Clicker——點擊、升級，並主宰餅乾的世界！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Satisfy your sweet tooth and unleash your inner baker with the Cookie Clicker extension! 🎂
Click, bake, and watch your cookie empire grow right in your browser. 📈 Upgrade your bakery, hire grandmas, and unlock mind-bending technologies to maximize your cookie production.

Features:
Addictive one-click gameplay 🔁
Dozens of upgrades and achievements 🏆
Quirky humor and surprises 😄
Runs in the background while you browse 🌐

Warning: May cause extreme cravings for real cookies! 🍪🤤

Click the menu in the top-left corner to play more games and keep the fun going! 🎮
